com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis

Class Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis.Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Adapter
extends java.lang.Thread
    Stores information about adapter. Sets message for server. Stores messages waiting to be sent for Scheduler, controls scheduler, controls Sensor's timers, sets up server and holds list of Sensors. Extends Thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • Adapter

        public Adapter(Logger logger)
        Creates instance of this class and class Scheduler. Used when all adapters have one logger.
        Parameters:
        logger - adapter's logger, not null

      • Adapter

        public Adapter(AdapterPanel panel,
       Logger logger)
        Assigns panel and logger to new instance of this class, creates instance of class Scheduler. Used when every adapter has own panel and logger.
        Parameters:
        panel - adapter's panel,not null
        logger - adapter's logger, not null

    • Method Detail

      • setServerParameters

        public void setServerParameters(ServerPanel panel,
                       java.lang.String host,
                       java.lang.String ip,
                       int port)
        Used when all adapters share one ServerPanel. Sends server parameters to scheduler.
        Parameters:
        panel - panel showing server information, not null
        host - server connection hostname, null when ip is not null
        ip - server connection ip address, null when host is not null
        port - server connection port, not null

      • setServerParameters

        public void setServerParameters(java.lang.String host,
                       java.lang.String ip,
                       int port)
        Used when every adapter has own ServerPanel Sends server parameters to scheduler.
        Parameters:
        host - server connection hostname, null when ip is not null
        ip - server connection ip address, null when host is not null
        port - server connection port, not null

      • initScheduler

        public void initScheduler()
        Starts scheduler's thread and starts processing messages.

        Shows errors:

        • SERVER_NOT_CREATED when server is null

      • run

        public void run()
        Ancestor class Thread implementation. Runs until terminate is set to true. When adapter is not active, sets thread to sleep for SLEEP_TIME.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • addSensor

        public void addSensor(SensorPanel panel)
        Adds new instance of class Sensor to list of sensors. Registers sensor for this adapter. Used when sensor has GUI own GUI panel
        Parameters:
        panel - sensor's panel for displaying information about sensor

      • addSensor

        public void addSensor(java.util.Properties properties)
        Adds new instance of class Sensor to list of sensors. Registers sensor for adapter. Sets Sensor's Sensor.fullMessage to write full messages. If sensor initialization is successful, activates this sensor.
        Parameters:
        properties -

      • createAdapterHeader

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer createAdapterHeader(int valuesSize)
        Creates ByteBuffer, writes adapter's information to it according to adapter -> server protocol and returns it to sensor.
        Parameters:
        valuesSize - (number of sensors * (long size in bytes + 2 bytes for sensor type)) - maximum possible sensor values message size.
        Returns:
        buffer filled with adapter information

      • stopSensorsTimers

        public void stopSensorsTimers()
        Stops all timers for sensor's in sensors list.

      • startSensorTimers

        public void startSensorTimers()
        Starts all timers for sensor's in sensors list.

      • setStoreValuesHistory

        public void setStoreValuesHistory()
        sets if history of sensor's values should be stored

      • updateDetails

        public void updateDetails()
        If adapter has panel, refreshes adapter's information.

      • messageSuccessfullySent

        public void messageSuccessfullySent()
        When message is successfully sent, it is removed from messages list and line in "To be sent" log is removed.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String logMsg)
        Writes message to logger, doesn't sent any messages to server.
        Parameters:
        logMsg - message to be written to log

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String logMsg,
               java.nio.ByteBuffer msg,
               Sensor sender)
        Adds new Message to messages list for scheduler to process. Writes logMsg to adapter's log.
        Parameters:
        logMsg - message to be written to log
        msg - protocol correct message, that will be sent to server
        sender - sensor, that sent the message

      • stopScheduler

        public void stopScheduler()
        Stops scheduler from processing more messages

        Starts scheduler's message processing

        When sensor has unsent messages, removes them.
        Parameters:

        public void delete()
        Delete adapter and all it's components

      • deleteSensor

        public SensorPanel deleteSensor(int id)
        Deletes sensor of given id. If this sensor has SensorPanel, returns it.
        Returns:
        sensor's panel, or null if sensor doesn't have panel.
